title: The figure shows a graph with potential energy on

content.question: The graph above represents the potential energy U as a function of displaceÂ­ment x for an object on the end of a spring oscillating in simple harmonic motion with amplitude x0. Which of the following graphs represents the kinetic energy K of the object as a function of displacement x?

choices.label: Answer choice A shows a graph with kinetic energy on the y-axis and displacement on the x-axis. Nine tick marks are shown on the y-axis, and the ninth is labelled U sub zero. Six tick marks are shown on the x-axis, three to the right of the origin and three to the left of the origin. The furthest right tick mark is labelled x sub zero, and the furthestleft tick mark is labelled negative x sub zero. The graph is a concave up parabola with its minimum at the origin. The left end of the parabola is at y-value U sub zero and x-value negative x sub zero. The right end of the parabola is at y-value U sub zero and x-value x sub zero.

Answer choice B shows a graph with kinetic energy on the y-axis and displacement on the x-axis. Nine tick marks are shown on the y-axis, and the ninth is labelled U sub zero. Six tick marks are shown on the x-axis, three to the right of the origin and three to the left of the origin. The furthest right tick mark is labelled x sub zero, and the furthest left tick mark is labelled negative x sub zero. On the left side of the graph is a straight line with a negativeslope going from y-value U sub zero and x-value negative x sub zero to the origin. On the right side of the graph is a straight line with a positive slope going from the origin to y-value U sub zero and x-value x sub zero.

Answer choiceC shows a graph with kinetic energy on the y-axis and displacement on the x-axis. Nine tick marks are shown on the y-axis, and the ninth is labelled U sub zero. Six tick marks are shown on the x-axis, three to the right of the origin and three to the leftof the origin. The furthest right tick mark is labelled x sub zero, and the furthest left tick mark is labelled negative x sub zero. The graph is a horizontal line at y-value U sub zero.

Answer choice D shows a graph with kinetic energy on the y-axis and displacement on the x-axis. Nine tick marks are shown on the y-axis, and the ninth is labelled U sub zero. Six tick marks are shown on the x-axis, three to the right of the origin and three to the left of the origin. The furthest right tick mark is labelled x sub zero, and the furthest left tick mark is labelled negative x sub zero. The graph is a concave down parabola with its maximum at y-value U sub zero and x-value zero. The left end of the parabola is at y-value zero and x-value negative x sub zero. The right end of the parabola is at y-value zero and x-value x sub zero.

Answer choice E shows a graph with kinetic energy on the y-axis and displacement on the x-axis. Nine tick marks are shown on the y-axis, and the ninth is labelled U sub zero. Six tick marks are shown on the x-axis, three to the right of the origin and three to the left of the origin. The furthest right tick mark is labelled x sub zero, and the furthest left tick mark is labelled negative x sub zero.On the left side of the graph is a straight line with a positive slope going from y-value zero and x-value negative x sub zero to y-value U sub zero and x-value zero. On the right side of the graph is a straight line with a negative slope going from y-value U sub zero and x-value zero to y-value zero and x-value x sub zero.

content.answer: Answer choice D shows a graph with kinetic energy on the y-axis and displacement on the x-axis. Nine tick marks are shown on the y-axis, and the ninth is labelled U sub zero. Six tick marks are shown on the x-axis, three to the right of the origin and three to the left of the origin. The furthest right tick mark is labelled x sub zero, and the furthest left tick mark is labelled negative x sub zero. The graph is a concave down parabola with its maximum at y-value U sub zero and x-value zero. The left end of the parabola is at y-value zero and x-value negative x sub zero. The right end of the parabola is at y-value zero and x-value x sub zero.

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
